room_title: Escape room "The Basement" by The Basement in Kansas City
room_description:
You and your friends have been kidnapped by Edward Tandy - a cannibalistic serial killer with a fine taste for unique electronics, taxidermy, and of course human flesh.. He has created a sick and twisted game of sorts in his deceased mother's home. He hopes to weed out the unintelligent and find those who are "worthy of escaping" by his late mother's standards. 

In THE BASEMENT, you and your team will have to employ keen communication skills, a finely tuned organizational prowess, and a general ability to keep your $h!t together under pressure if you want to survive. This is what we like to call a "funnel puzzle" where you will find numerous items and clues throughout the room. These items all come together to orchestrate your escape.
